title: Table is moving over time, cordless drill dancing in qualification task 2 scenario

content.raw: The table in qual task 2 moves around quite significantly on standard settings. While I welcome a challenge (and qual task 2 otherwise is not that challenging), it's still a bit annoying not to be able to just let the system run and do some testing. After about 2:30 minutes of simulation time, the drill usually has left the table and only is dangling in the air, as shown in the attached picture. Might be fixed if #166 is implemented also for qualification worlds.
